title: Show recipe name in Recipe Box list items
description:
When a recipe list is expanded in the Recipe Box page, each recipe item only shows 'View Recipe →' and the added date. Users cannot identify which recipe is which without clicking through.

The RecipeListItem API type only contains recipe_id, id, recipe_list_id, and added_at - it does NOT include the recipe name.

## Solution
Create a RecipeListItemDisplay component that:
1. Accepts recipeId and addedAt props
2. Uses useRecipe hook to fetch recipe details
3. Shows loading skeleton while fetching
4. Displays recipe name as primary text with 'View Recipe →' as secondary

## Acceptance Criteria
- Recipe name is visible in the expanded list view
- Loading state shows skeleton/placeholder while fetching
- Test coverage for the new component
- Confirm remove functionality confirms with recipe name (not 'this recipe')
close_reason: Implemented RecipeListItemDisplay component that fetches and displays recipe name
